faq.question: Is coaching different for different classes?
faq.answer: Yes, courses are customized for each class from 5th to 12th and XII+.

faq.question: Is there any scholarship program?
faq.answer: Yes, top 500 students are eligible for 100% scholarship.

faq.question: How to enroll for NEET exam preparation?
faq.answer: You can apply through our online portal or visit our nearest branch.

faq.question: Are online sessions available?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer both online and offline sessions for all students.
